subject: Politics
title: Crypto and State Power
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Crypto and State Power.

hook.text: Bitcoin was built to escape government control. Governments are now building their own digital currencies to fight back.

buildup.text: Cryptocurrency promises decentralized finance without banks or state oversight. It challenges monetary sovereignty.

discovery.text: China launched a digital yuan. The EU plans a digital euro. Central bank digital currencies are coming.

twist.text: Digital state currencies could enable total surveillance of spending. Every purchase tracked, every transaction visible.

climax.text: The battle between private crypto and state digital currency will shape financial freedom for decades.

punchline.text: Money is power. Who controls digital money controls the future of finance.

quiz.question: What risk do central bank digital currencies pose?
options: They could enable total government surveillance of all financial transactions
They would eliminate all forms of taxation
They have no impact on personal privacy
